titleStmt.title: An earnest call to the people of England to beware of the temptations of the regicide. Ludlow, to contract the guilt of the murther of King Charles the First, by a conceit that the shedding of that royal bloud was no murther, but an act of justice.
titleStmt.author: Elys, Edmund, ca. 1634-ca. 1707.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
